heading: HB00238
0: AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE AMOUNT OF TWO HUNDRED FIFTY MILLION PESOS (P250,000,000.00) FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF A TRANS-AXIAL HIGHWAY TO BE KNOWN AS THE "GOVERNOR WILLIAM CHIONGBIAN NATIONAL HIGHWAY" FROM BARANGAY POBLACION TRAVERSING BARANGAYS VILLAFLOR, BUNGA, TOLIYOK, MIALEN AND SEBUCAL, ALL IN THE CITY OF OROQUIETA, TO BARANGAY MANSAWAN IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF DON VICTORIANO, MISAMIS OCCIDENTAL AND CONNECTING TO A NATIONAL HIGHWAY IN THE MUNICIPALITYOF JOSEFINA, PROVINCE OF ZAMBOANGA DEL SUR
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS since 2016-07-26
history:
